title: Keeping Austin wired (for high-tech manufacturing) - TechCrunch
content: Keeping Austin wired (for high-tech manufacturing)  TechCrunch
description: Motorola’s Fort Worth, Texas assembly plant lasted almost exactly a year. The message from the Google-owned smartphone brand was simple: The whole exercise had proven too difficult. “What we found was that the North American market was exceptionally tough,” Rick Osterloh stated simply a…
